originalText.text: Dr. Rowe is one of the best chiropractors I've ever been to. I've been adjusted by many chiropractors over the years, and Dr. Rowe definitely sets the bar on what an adjustment should be. Outside of his skill as a chiropractor, he is one of the kindest and most compassionate doctors I've been to. He truly cares about you as the patient, a rare thing to find amongst a doctor nowadays. I highly recommend Dr. Rowe and his office.

originalText.text: Dr. Rowe is one of the best chiropractors in the world. I am a uniquely qualified opinion as I have been teaching and coaching Chiropractors internationally for 20 years. He is not only my go-to referral for all patients in New York City – but he is the doctor that I personally seek out at my seminars to get checked and adjusted by the best. Hundreds of excellent and qualified chiropractors in the crowd – I choose Dr. David to check me every time. An excellent and knowledgeable clinician, Dr. David delivers every time.

originalText.text: These folks are so great. The staff is warm and friendly and the office is lovely to look at.  I’ve been in treatment with Dr. Rowe and now Dr. Oullette/Kahn on and off for 37 years. I’ve had other chiropractors during the years due to my location changes and no one has ever brought relief and thorough targeted help to my spine the way they have.

text.text: These folks are so great. The staff is warm and friendly and the office is lovely to look at.  I’ve been in treatment with Dr. Rowe and now Dr. Oullette/Kahn on and off for 37 years. I’ve had other chiropractors during the years due to my location changes and no one has ever brought relief and thorough targeted help to my spine the way they have.

originalText.text: Ever since becoming a patient at Rowe Chiropractic, I've felt significant & improved progress with the way my body feels and operates on a day to day basis. The work, practice, and mission here is unique because the focus is centered around finding solutions rather than just pain/symptom management & tolerance. Dr. Rowe creates personalized care plans that cater towards each individual's issues with an intention to "fix" the root of each problem and provide the necessary structure to correct, not just maintain. I have learned how vital spinal care is and will continue to prioritize that for the rest of my life. Thanks to Dr. Rowe, I've felt and experienced preeminent progress in one year than I have in my previous 12 years of chiropractic care. While the cost is significant, the care is unmatched. Hopefully insurance providers will eventually expand their scope to cover chiropractic care in the same manner as other medical necessities/services.

originalText.text: Dr Rowe and his staff are just amazing, you feel like family. When i first came to Dr Rowe I had excruciating back and lumbar pain to a point had to have epidural corticosteroids shots that helped temporarily and needed to be repeated every 2/3 months. My pain got reduced by 50th from the 3rd session.I highly recommend Dr Rowe to anyone seeking sustainable pain relief. 1
